subsection.name: Create Job
subsection.p: The create binning job will take the arguments and persist a DiagnosticBinningJob with a 'NCNEXUS' study & return the identifier.

subsection.name: Load VCF
subsection.p: Persist variants from a vcf file...skipping homozygous reference calls.

subsection.name: Annotate Variants
subsection.p: Annotating a LocatedVariant involves determining the transcript location & adding HGVS expressions.

subsection.name: Load Coverage
subsection.p: Coverage can be from a GATKDepthOfCoverage summary file or from a SAMToolsDepth file.

subsection.name: Update Frequencies
subsection.p: Updating the MaxFrequency table to based on information from 1000Genome, ExAC, or dbSNP.

subsection.name: Update Diagnostic Bins
subsection.p: Do the actual binning using MaxFrequency, HGMD, and/or ClinVar metadata.

subsection.name: Generate Report
subsection.p: Persists counts from tables involved in running the binning process (ie, # of snps processed, # of HGDM known pathogenic variants, etc.).
